post.body: i saw a dateline where people were hijacking others phones thru bluetooth and making calls to their own 900#s. Check ur bill!
I do know that one person cares about me. And she'll be here in a little while to take me to my first xmas breakfast ever.
Happy xmas all. This is probably my least favorite holiday cuz it lets me know how many people don't care about me.
Wow. Just realized this is the first year i didnt go to the german xmas market downtown. Kinda sad. I love that thing.
Why is it every time i make this vegetable pasta thing, i start it at 9pm? So good but so late.
It's so much harder to appreciate the work of an artist when you get to know him and he sucks. Even tho his work might be great he sucks.
That guy who does i was there.com just told me he was too busy to bring his camera and i just sa him shooting. Liars bother me.
Weird. This unknown photog has unofficially turned the upstairs of evil olive into a photo booth for one girl. I'd be creeped out.
Smoking a cig outside evil olive watching the most drunk girl i've ever seen.
Watched contact last night and thought it was awesome. Except jodi foster playing a straight woman. That was weird.
I keep waking up soaked in sweat like i just ran a marathon. Gross, lame, and smelly.
Weather: Chicago, IL 60622 -1F, Blowing Snow Wind: W 23 mph Sun: 0F-5F Mon: 11F-11F. Beautiful. Love it when the hi and lo are the same.
That party was pretty cool tho. It felt like i was breaking the law when i walked in the door. Is that what makes a party cool?
Ugh i came out of that party and it was daylight! All i remember after that was walking to find a cab and being so frozen i couldn't talk.
Totally lost track of time. Leaving party now. So cold and drunk. Brrr
But i do have to say its noice to smoke and drink simultaneously. Spell it out. Si mul tan e ous ly
This party is totally speakeasy style like the depression. I love being a part of it but i hate the smoke!
Hiding from this drunk creep at an underground party i'm shooting. He won't stop following me!
I really like those led christmas lights but they're just not the same as the old timey ones.
Just looked at the most best place i could imagine. Location, new, cheap with a great kitchen. Only prob-2250 deposit. Ne1 gettin married?
